mapper.select: select * from (select * from tbl_product order by like_it desc) a where rownum <= 4
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product(prod_code, prod_name, prod_desc, price, sale_price, like_it, prod_image) values (#{prodCode}, #{prodName}, #{prodDesc}, #{price}, #{salePrice}, #{likeIt}, #{prodImage})
